review: If you have any device that can mirror iPhone/iPod to your HD TV, I think this is not very useful. It does not mirror your iPhone. This device only works with a few apps, such as Netflix. There is also some limitation on Network setting. The only good thing is you can control your Netflix wirelessly with your iPhone.

review: Still learning about everything we can do with this but definitely worth the price!  Need an expert to come teach me more!
author: ron judge

review: After seeing all the rave reviews, I decided to give this a try.  It set up fairly easily.  A few little hiccups but nothing major.  The trouble came when I started watching content.  After about 1-2 min the video started to jitter, then stop.  "Re-casting" worked ok, but again and repeatedly it would jitter than stop after 1-2 min.  Occasionally the connection was completely lost.  I checked the troubleshooting guide and found that this is a "known issue" and that what I've already been doing - recasting - is their recommended fix until they work out the bugs.This is an unacceptable bug.  I deem it unusable as it is.
author: Stuart B. Wtherbe "sbwetherbe"

review: What can I say, $35 and I can stream stuff from any of my electronic devices to the TV. as well when friend come over all they have to do is connect to my wireless and they can start streaming  too. I love this little thing. It has completely put our smart blue-ray player out of commision.
